item.description:
Hola a todos!!

Let's get together for some yummy Mexican and some festive drinks!!! What a great way to get to know one another! There is a restaurant in Quincy that has great reviews, and is very accessible. Let's give it a shot, and see if this might be a regular event for our group! Check out the website, if you like (lapalomarestaurant.com)

Margaritas y nachos para todos!!

Of course, I would expect that everyone pay their own bill. But I will call ahead to make the reservation, so PLEASE RSVP to make the reservation accurate. Since this is a dinner event, bring along family members or non-Spanish speaking friends if you want. My husband and daughter may be tagging along...they love Mexican!

Tell the receptionist you are with the Spanish speaking group under the name "Meaghen". That way, everyone will be directed to the right table!

Salud!
Meaghen

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at La Paloma!!!
